description: This file contains code for initializing a PDF knowledge base, loading documents with metadata, and setting up an agent to query the knowledge base with filters, specifically related to PDF document filtering based on load-time metadata.

classes.name: LanceDb
classes.description: A class representing a connection to a LanceDB vector database, used for storing and retrieving document embeddings.

classes.name: PDFKnowledgeBase
classes.description: A class managing a collection of PDF documents with associated metadata, supporting loading and filtering.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: A class that facilitates querying the knowledge base with optional filters and presenting responses.

methods.name: download_knowledge_filters_sample_data
methods.description: Downloads sample PDF files for testing knowledge filters.

methods.name: load_document
methods.description: Loads a document into the knowledge base with associated metadata.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Outputs the response to a query, optionally formatted in markdown.
